original_body_lines: The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CEYPETCO) has slashed the prices of kerosene per litre.
Accordingly, the price of a litre of kerosene, which previously stood at Rs. 355, has been reduced by Rs. 50 to Rs. 305.
At the same time, the revised price of industrial kerosene is now set at Rs. 330 following a reduction of Rs. 134.
The price revision is effective from midnight today (March 01), the CEYPETCO announced in a press release.
The CEYPETCO further noted that the prices of Petrol 92 Octane, Petrol 95 Octane EURO 4, Clear Diesel and Super Diesel 4 Star Euro4 will remain unchanged for the time being.
